00041     #define OGRE_NUM_RENDERTARGET_GROUPS 10

00059     class _OgreExport RenderTarget

00063         {
00064             SF_NONE           = 0,
00065             SF_FPS            = 1,
00066             SF_AVG_FPS        = 2,
00067             SF_BEST_FPS       = 4,

00070             SF_ALL            = 0xFFFF
00071         };
